validationErrs.usernameConditions: Username should be alphanumeric and can contain underscore only

validationErrs.passwordConditions: Must contain 8 characters, atleast one Uppercase, one Lowercase and one Number

imageUploadErrs.file-too-large: file size should not be more than 10 MB

imageUploadErrs.too-many-files: Number of files should not be more than
imageUploadErrs.batch-limit-exceed: Maximum size of the selected images should not exceed 10 MB per upload. In case your combined image size is more than 10 MB, then please try uploading few images in multiple tries.
imageUploadErrs.file-invalid-type: is not a supported file type
